info.title: swgoh-comlink
info.description: An API for sending requests to Star Wars Galaxy of Heroes' game services

get.summary: Endpoint to check if the service is ready
Endpoint to check if the service is alive
Get an object containing all of the game data enums

includePveUnits.description: Whether to include pve units in the collections or not.

requestSegment.description: Mutually exclusive with the items parameter. Uses the game data segment enums.

items.description: Mutually exclusive with the requestSegment parameter. Uses a binary bit mask converted to integer string where each collection to include in the response is represented by its digit being set to 1 to include, 0 to not include.

errorMessage.pattern: must be 22 digits long and only contain alphanumeric characters plus - and _

defId.description: Values such as `sith_raid`, `rancor`, `rancor_challenge`, `aat`, `kraytdragon`, `speederbike` and so on
Values such as `t01D`, `t02D`, and so on

Values such as `GUILD:RAIDS:NORMAL_DIFF:SITH_RAID:DIFF06`.  Known values are `SITH_RAID:DIFF06` and `HEROIC85`, `AAT:DIFF06` and `HEROIC80`, `RANCOR:DIFF01` through `DIFF06`, `KRAYTDRAGON:DIFF01`, and `ROTJ:SPEEDERBIKE`

errorMessage.additionalProperties: The searchCriteria field (and any other fields not in the spec) must not be included when searching by name
The name field (and any other fields not in the spec) must not be included when searching by searchCriteria

post.summary: View GAC leaderboards.  Supports both the global leaderboards, as well as the leaderboards for the GAC groupings of 8.

then.description: Leaderboards from the individual brackets of 8. Only returns results while the event bracket is active.

eventInstanceId.description: Combination of the event Id and the instance ID, separated by :

groupId.description: Must start with the same eventInstanceId, followed by the league and bracketId, separated by :. The number at the end is the bracketId, and goes from 0 to N, where N is the last group of 8 players.

errorMessage.additionalProperties: Fields other than groupId and eventInstanceId must not be included when using leaderboardType 4

then.description: 'Global' GAC leaderboards for each league and division

errorMessage.additionalProperties: Fields other than league and division must not be included when using leaderboardType 6

league.description: Enum values 20, 40, 60, 80, and 100 correspond to carbonite, bronzium, chromium, aurodium, and kyber respectively

division.description: Enum values 5, 10, 15, 20, and 25 correspond to divisions 5 through 1 respectively

id.description: The localization bundle ID from the /metadata response can be appended with the locale desired to decrease the response size, example: ':ENG_US'

post.summary: Get the name spaces for segmented content

errorMessage.pattern: must be 9 digits long and only contain numbers 1-9
must be 22 digits long and only contain alphanumeric characters plus - and _

errorMessage.oneOf: Must include either allyCode or playerId, but not both

errorMessage.pattern: must be 9 digits long and only contain numbers 1-9
must be 22 digits long and only contain alphanumeric characters plus - and _

errorMessage.oneOf: Must include either allyCode or playerId, but not both
